title: Bitter Debt Fight Between Argentina And U.S. Set To Reach Climax
teaser: For much of the past 14 years, Argentina has grappled with its international creditors over how much it has to pay them. A deadline set by the U.S. Supreme Court is coming up, a date that's expected to bring the dispute to a head.
